title: Citi Czech Republic Launches New Service Citi Global Banking
summary: Prague, Czech Republic - Citibank Europe plc has introduced Citi Global Banking, a new service utilizing Citibank's wide international network of branches to facilitate more convenient banking between the Czech Republic and foreign countries for Citi clients.
tag-1: Citi Czech Republic Launches New Service Citi Global Banking
tag-2: Prague, Czech Republic – Citibank Europe plc has introduced Citi Global Banking, a new service utilizing Citibank's wide international network of branches to facilitate more convenient banking between the Czech Republic and foreign countries for Citi clients.
tag-3: The new service enables clients to take care of all necessary administration related to opening a bank account with Citibank in foreign countries before leaving their place of residence, free of charge. At the same time, expats who are planning to live in the Czech Republic can open their new bank account before arriving to the Czech Republic. Citigold clients can automatically use their account and related services abroad if they fulfill requirements for the Citigold program.
tag-4: "We believe that Citi Global Banking will be appreciated by all Citi clients who regularly travel abroad, for work or privately, as well as by expats living long-term in the Czech Republic," said Veronika Španárová, Retail Bank Head at Citibank. "Launching the Citi Global Banking service is in-line with our long term strategy to focus on customer care and convenience."
tag-5: Citi Global Banking enables opening and managing a bank account with Citibank in any of the 30 countries where the service is offered and through the Global Support Centers free of charge.
tag-7: Citigroup, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citigroup provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com.
